TopicTitle: Circle the space center: The new Kerbal pastime!

Articles.Content:
During my efforts to see how impractical a 'plane' could make that could still fly over the Kerbin countryside without instantly crashing, I accidentally caused this:

It was a blast until the fuel tanks ran out! Then they crashed into Box064.

Seems like a strange name to give part of your space center, but who am I to judge Kerbal naming conventions?

All I can say about this whole thing is: Lol...

First, the circle image, then the Kerbal naming system.
